## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`ccs_monit`](#ccs_monit): Install and configure monit.

## Classes

### <a name="ccs_monit"></a>`ccs_monit`

Install and configure monit.

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `ccs_monit` class:

* [`mailhost`](#mailhost)
* [`alert`](#alert)
* [`pkgurl`](#pkgurl)
* [`pkgurl_user`](#pkgurl_user)
* [`pkgurl_pass`](#pkgurl_pass)
* [`uptime`](#uptime)
* [`gpfs`](#gpfs)
* [`hosts`](#hosts)
* [`temp`](#temp)
* [`network`](#network)

##### <a name="mailhost"></a>`mailhost`

Data type: `String`

String specifying smtp server

Default value: `'localhost'`

##### <a name="alert"></a>`alert`

Data type: `Variant[String,Array[String]]`

String giving email address to receive alerts; or an array of strings.

Default value: `'root@localhost'`

##### <a name="pkgurl"></a>`pkgurl`

Data type: `String`

String specifying URL to fetch sources from

Default value: `'https://example.org'`

##### <a name="pkgurl_user"></a>`pkgurl_user`

Data type: `String`

String specifying username for pkgurl

Default value: `'someuser'`

##### <a name="pkgurl_pass"></a>`pkgurl_pass`

Data type: `String`

String specifying password for pkgurl

Default value: `'somepass'`

##### <a name="uptime"></a>`uptime`

Data type: `Boolean`

Monitor uptime

Default value: ``true``

##### <a name="gpfs"></a>`gpfs`

Data type: `Boolean`

Monitor gpfs

Default value: ``false``

##### <a name="hosts"></a>`hosts`

Data type: `Array[String]`

Monitor hosts

Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="temp"></a>`temp`

Data type: `Boolean`

Monitor temp

Default value: ``false``

##### <a name="network"></a>`network`

Data type: `Boolean`

Monitor networks

Default value: ``true``
